action.description: The committee on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Poepoe, Hashem, Kahaloa, Takayama, Todd, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; 3 Noes: Representative(s) Belatti, Perruso, Shimizu; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran.
